snippet.title: Bears vs. Art - Global Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Click to Subscribe: http://bit.ly/HalfbrickYTSubscribe

Bears vs. Art is now available WORLDWIDE! 

Download on iOS: http://apple.co/1MqzjuW
Get it now on Gplay: http://bit.ly/1M7a2sE

While pompous guests admire perplexing paintings, you get to rip them to shreds in this fun new puzzle game from the creators of Fruit Ninja and Jetpack Joyride.

The fight against subtext starts now!

LIKE US ON FACEBOOK: http://facebook.com/bearsvsart
FOLLOW US ON TWITTER: http://twitter.com/bearsvsart
VISIT THE OFFICIAL WEBSITE: http://bearsvsart.com
